item.title: Sem IV English Syllabus
item.description: Module 1: The Essay [[A Room of Ones Own|Room of One’s Own]] - [[Virginia Woolf]] [[The Character of Dogs]] by [[Robert Louis Stevenson]] [[Advice to Youth]]- [[Mark Twain]] Module 2 : The Poetry [[Partition by WH Auden]] [[Sailing to Byzantium]] by [[WB Yeats]] [[Preludes]] by [[TS Eliot]] [[Dawn At Puri]] by [[Jayanta Mahapatra]] [[America - Allen Ginsberg]] by [[Allen Ginsberg]] [[Imagine - John Lennon]] by John Lennon Module 3 : The Novel & Drama The Moon and Six Pence- William Somerset Maugham [[The Moon and Six Pence]] [[A Portrait of the Artist as a Young Man]] - James Joyce [[Nagamandala]] - Girish Karnad Module 4 Visual Texts [[Schindler’s List]] [[Pygmalion]] by [[George Bernard Shaw]]
